tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE workers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    role STRING,
    department STRING,
    is_contractor BOOL
)

CREATE TABLE contractors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    company VARCHAR(50),
    contract_start DATE,
    contract_end DATE
);

CREATE TABLE personnel (         id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,         name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,         title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,         department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,         hazardous_training BOOLEAN NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE contractors (         id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,         name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,         company VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,         hazardous_certification BOOLEAN NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE waste_sites (         id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,         location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,         capacity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE waste_categories (         id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,         category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE personnel_assignment (         assignment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,         personnel_id INT NOT NULL,         contractor_id INT NOT NULL,         site_id INT NOT NULL,         date_assigned DATE NOT NULL,         date_completed DATE );
